extends java.lang.Object

The MemoryUtilities class contains several methods of general-purpose use which are used throughout the program.

Method Summary
static short addressOffset(short addr)
          Gets the page offset of a 16-bit memory address by extracting the low 9 bits.
static byte pageAddress(short addr)
          Gets the page number of a 16-bit memory address by extracting the high 7 bits.
static short randomShort()
          Generates a random word, manipulating an internal seed which is initially set to the system time.
static java.lang.String sShortToHex(short s)
          Converts the incoming word argument to a signed capital hexadecimal string with a negative sign (not padded).
static java.lang.String uShortToHex(short s)
          Converts the incoming word argument to a 4-digit padded capital hexadecimal string.

randomShort

public static short randomShort()
Generates a random word, manipulating an internal seed which is initially set to the system time.

Returns:
a random word
